### resolveReferences() {#ae0a0acc2abd5f83c1b358b9842d0bfe0}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>const Init &#42; VarInit::resolveReferences (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/resolver">Resolver</a> &amp; R) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
This method is used by classes that refer to other variables which may not be defined at the time they expression is formed.

If a value is set for the variable later, this method will be called on users of the value to allow the value to propagate out.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/tablegen/record-h/#l01224">1224</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/tablegen/record-h">Record.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/record-cpp/#l02281">2281</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/record-cpp">Record.cpp</a>.
